channel.title: How can I get this client to connect to my ip?
channel.description: Okay, I have the ddsspeced source and client but, only I can connect to the client. I portforwarded already and it works on silabsoft. I sent my friend the download link and when he tries to log in it says error connecting to server and the server is online. Do I have to change something to the client and host the changed client to a website or what?

item.title: How can I get this client to connect to my ip?
item.dc:creator: @Master_Monk Master Monk
item.description:
@Master_Monk wrote:

I Had the same Problem but then i found out it was just the client- Try using a different client, it should work.

item.title: How can I get this client to connect to my ip?
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

Ur EGUI.java looks like this - read.

import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;

public class EGUI
{
public static void main(String args[])
{
client.main(new String[] {
“insert i.p”, “insert i.p”, “insert i.p”
});
}
}
